RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 16600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOP ZAPPER took over on the chute and set a pressured pace, raced at the rail on the turn and dug in under steady encouragement to hold on well. WINDSOR'S STAR pressured the pace through the backstretch and raced close off the rail on the turn, dug in leaving the turn and just held the nod for second. CALLISTO'S BRIGADE gave chase, rounded the turn about the three path, finished well and just missed the nod for second. RAISE A RUCKUS pressed the pace inside, raced close at the rail on the turn and ran evenly down the lane. METALLIC CAT chased outside, rounded the turn in the four path and showed little further. TO THE TOP chased inside, raced at the rail on the turn and showed little in the lne.

ENTRY.NAME: Bop Zapper
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,dug in lane,held well

ENTRY.NAME: Metallic Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Windsor's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed,close 2d turn,dug in lane,just held nod 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRINKWITHTHESTARS took a quick lead and rated the pace while tapering in, came under pressure toward the quarter pole, rounded the turn at the rail and was steadily handled in the lane. DOC ELM gave chase, raced in the four path on the turn and finished well, though settled for second. DIVINING DANCER chased through the backstretch, raced at the rail on the turn, eased out entering the stretch and came along for third later yards. UNCLE REMI gave chase, rounded the turn about the three path and flattened inside the eighth pole. BARB'S PRIDE came away very awkwardly then gave chase toward the outside, rounded the turn in the three and four paths and lost action entering the stretch. HELL'S KITTEN gave chase, raced in the four path of the turn and showed little in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Barb's Pride
ENTRY.OWNER: P and H Stables and C and B Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Drinkwiththestars
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick lead,rated pace inside,pressured 1/4,rail turn,drvng finish

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 10800. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DAPPLESANDDIAMONDS gave close early chase but steadied in the vicinity of the five sixteenths pole, raced evenly at the rail on the turn then dug in from the head of the lane to take over later yards. EVERYDAYISAGIFT set a pressured pace from the half mile pole, rounded the turn near the rail and was steadily handled through the stretch, but was met later yards. TALENTED CORINNA stumbled at the break then pressured the early pace, raced close in the three path on the turn and ran evenly in the lane. FIDDLERSHOTPLEASUR came away awkwardly then gave chase, raced in the five path on the turn and ran evenly in the stretch. TIPSY TOURIST chased outside, raced in the six path on the turn and finished evenly.

ENTRY.NAME: Dapplesanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: close chase,steadied 5/16,rail turn,dug in lane,up later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Everydayisagift
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,met later yards

ENTRY.NAME: Talented Corinna
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell Kim and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Tipsy Tourist
ENTRY.OWNER: Rising Sun Racing Stables Inc and Eubanks Annette M

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs.

CLAIM.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUE N GOLD was bumped leaving the gate then raced with the early pace two deep and between horses, took the nod toward the nine sixteenths pole, raced at even terms from that point, contested the rail on the far turn and dug in determinedly to inch clear nearing mid-stretch. S S SPARTAN ENERGY rated just off the pace about the three path, challenged leaving the three eighths pole and dueled at even terms two deep on the turn, but dropped back approaching mid-stretch and had to settle for second. GET OFF MY CLOUD rated close inside, picked up the chase from the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn about the three path, drifted leaving the turn then dug in and took the nod for third under the wire. IN JUBALATION saved ground on the first turn then eased out into the backstretch, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole, raced in range in the three path on the far turn but drifted toward the head of the lane, left the turn outside and flattened late yards. AIR MEDAL raced in the four path the first turn, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn about the four path and showed little in the stretch. SIENTE EL AMOR came away awkwardly and made contact with Blue N Gold, raced with the early pace inside, was met toward the nine sixteenths pole and gave chase into the backstretch, but faded leaving the five sixteenths pole. JUST A FLIRT stalked from the three path, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole but weakened on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Get Off My Cloud
ENTRY.OWNER: A and B Racing Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,chased 3/8,3p far turn,drift 1/8,nod 3rd wire

ENTRY.NAME: Blue N Gold
ENTRY.OWNER: Funkhouser III, Raymond J. and Funkhouser, John C.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 12300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Three Races At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eli gibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROCKY DICE rated close inside, bid into the backstretch and took the nod two deep midway on the far turn, then dug in determinedly to just last. SULEMAN saved ground off the pace, bid nearing the three eighths pole and raced off the rail on the far turn, dug in from the head of the lane to take second in the final yards and just missed. STRONG HEART rated close to the early pace about the four path, closed to the front approaching the three quarter pole and rated the pace, came under pressure past the three eighths, was met at the rail midway on the far turn then outfinished in the duel through the stretch. ADARA broke traction at the start then saved some early ground, bid leaving the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path and ran evenly in the stretch. STAVANGER rated off the rail early, picked up the chase past the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and showed little in the lane. ANVIL rated a slim early lead, was met nearing the three quarter pole and gave chase into the backstretch, but faded past the three eighths pole. RIGHTEOUS MAN raced in the five path the first turn, was well off the pace into the second turn and showed little response. POWER (BRZ) was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Suleman
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid 3/8,off rail turn,up 2nd late,just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Stavanger
ENTRY.COMMENT: off rail,chased past 7/16,3p far turn,empty lane

ENTRY.NAME: Adara
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke traction start,saved ground,bid 3/8,3p far turn,evenly lane

ENTRY.NAME: Anvil
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated slim early lead,met near 3/4,chased 1/2,faded past 3/8

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 28400. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR WAIVER CLAIMING OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOXY SISTA raced well off the pace inside, crept closer leaving the half mile pole and took over toward the quarter, drew off through the far turn and appeared much the best. FRENCHIES GOLD rounded the opening turn about the five path then saved ground, bid nearing the three eighths pole and improved steadily, raced at the rail on the far turn but was no match in the lane. LAUGHINTOTHEBANK rounded the first turn in the four path, bid past the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the four path on the far turn and got up for third nearing mid-stretch. MISS LAUREN raced well back inside, picked up the chase past the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the three path and showed little more. REVEIRS MINUTE took over soon after the start and drew off to a long early lead, came under pressure past the three eighths pole, was met toward the quarter pole and faded at the rail on the far turn. UNUSUALLY LUCKY dwelt at the start. CASTLE OF CAYLEE raced well off the pace and off the rail, gave chase from the three eighths pole but faded on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Foxy Sista
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside,crept closer from 1/2,up near 1/4,drew off turn,much best

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Lauren
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back inside,chased 3/8,3p far turn,little in lane

ENTRY.NAME: Reveirs Minute
ENTRY.COMMENT: long lead inside,pressured 3/8,met near 1/4,faded rail far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 107. Allowance Purse 31300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 3 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COASTAL MISSION moved to the inside and rated a slim lead, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, edged clear toward the quarter, raced at the rail on the far turn and was steadily handled through the lane. CLASSIER ducked out and exchanged contact with SOCIAL CHIC then rated close inside, started his bid nearing the five sixteenths pole, was eased off the rail midway on the far turn and dueled through the stretch for second. The latter exchanged contact with Classier leaving the gate then saved ground, gave chase toward the five sixteenths pole and improved at the rail on the far turn, but was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. NO CHANGE saved ground well off the early pace, picked up the chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail and ran evenly in the lane. OUTLIER stalked two deep, challenged leaving the three eighths pole but dropped back toward the quarter and weakened approaching the head of the lane. DONTMESAWITHME stalked the earlier pace three wide, gave chase toward the three eighths pole, raced in the four path on the far turn and showed little in the lane. EASTERN BAY settled off the rail on the first turn then eased outward into the backstretch, gave chase from the three eighths pole but flattened in the four path on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: No Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 3/8,off rail far turn,evenly lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 58. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. NO WVB CLAUSE.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMIDA COMIDA gave chase inside and took the lead leaving the three eighths pole, raced at the rail on the turn and held well under steady stretch handling. TAKE CHARGE LISA chased and raced close off the rail on the turn, dug in through the stretch, flattened late but held on for second. GREAT DEVOTION chased through the backstretch, raced at the rail on the turn, eased out past the eighth pole and was gaining on the waning runner-up. WICKED WISDOM chased the leaders through the backstretch, rounded the turn off the rail then flattened inside the sixteenth pole. AMERICAS WOMAN gave chase, raced in the three and four paths on the turn, left the turn outside and passed some rivals. MIDNIGHT PASS gave chase, rounded the turn about the five path and weakened in the lane. QUEEN OF KANTHAROS came away sharply with the early lead but was met leaving the three eighths pole and faded toward the head of the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Comida Comida
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside,up past 3/8,rail turn,held well driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC & Greenspring Mares LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Take Charge Lisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,close off rail turn,held on 2nd,flattened late
